name: Cars2D Pro
description:
This game is provided with two different and amazing options to choose between one car (option 1) or two cars (option 2) to play the game.
In one car (i.e. option 1), the player has to control the one single car and the aim is to increase the score by avoiding traffic, and the speed of the car increases with time.
In two cars (i.e. option 2), the player has to control the two cars simultaneously and has to avoid the traffic for both the cars. And the speed of both the cars increases with time.
